website_summaries.verdict: While some younger riders may find it a bit heavy, the aluminum frame provides a lot of stability and durability. Arrives almost fully assembled, and major parts can be easily upgraded or replaced if necessary.
pros: Easy to assemble straight out of box
21-gear derailleur and suspension fork provide easy, comfortable ride
Size is good for both youth and adult riders
cons: Some reports of missing or broken parts on arrival
Frame may be too heavy for younger riders

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, 36 pounds, Easy to assemble, for riders 56" to 62"
customer_reviews.text: Packaging on the 24" bike says "Recommended for riders 56" to 62" inches tall". I weighed the bike after fully assembled. It's 36 pounds including kickstand and reflectors (which are pre-assembled on bike). Assembly was easy: Simply install the handlebars, front wheel, seat and pedals (which are clearly labeled left/right and show thread-direction) and inflate the tires. Everything else is pre-assembled and pre-adjusted (even the brakes and shifters, but I needed to tweak the brakes slightly). Has good instructions, but you will need tools.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Dad

customer_reviews.title: The plastic gear in the rear derailleur broke on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic gear in the rear derailleur broke on the first ride. Although I could replace the part, I'm returning this because I'm not sure what else will break after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 7474

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bike for the money!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT bike for the money! My daughter took it to the local bike shop that was trying to sell her a bike for $500-$600 and they said she got a great deal. This is not a bike for a professional biker/racer, but for just for fun use, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: JnikoleC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 11-13 year old wanting a bigger bike
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. Easy to assemble right out of box. All parts were in good shape and packaged very well. Simple to tune up too! Feels well-built, not too heavy for a MTB and comfortable to ride. Remember that tire inflation pressure is 50psi (45-50 should be good) and any less impacts ride quality and effort required to bike. Mongoose is a reliable and solid brand. In terms of add-ons and changes, perhaps change the seat as per one's preference. Also, I would recommend getting mudguards and LED reflectors for front and rear. That's about it!
customer_reviews.author: Gaj Aiyer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of derailleur!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bike, but, the rear derailleur is trash. I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas, and on the first day she had it, not only did the derailleur break, but the chain snapped in two also. I contacted Amazon, and they are sending a replacement bike for her, so we will see if this was a fluke, or a flaw in the design. If the replacement does the same thing, I will be asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: She should love it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for Granddaughter for Christmas. She should love it. It is a really pretty purple that the picture online does not due justice to. The Shimanno derailleur works soo much smoother than my old bike. It was very easy to put together, even though the instructions are not quite right for this version of the bike. Seems like it should hold up well, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Old Man

customer_reviews.title: The Shimano derailluer broke less than 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this experience. The bike actually looks solid enough but there must have been some damage during delivery. It arrived with the chain having fallen off and pulling on the rear derailluer, which was not otherwise secured during packing. After resetting the chain, it looked like it had deformed and weakened the derailluer. Was hoping it was just cosmetic but likely was led to it breaking this past weekend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: This is actually an excellent bike. I bought it for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This is actually an excellent bike.I bought it for my granddaughter. The only problem I have with the bike is that one of the brake cables was messed up and some of the paint was scratched on the frame. I don't think these bikes normally arrive in this condition, but this one did. I'm not sure where to get a new cable for the bike, but will figure it out, Anyway... Looking past the imperfections of the bike, the bike rides very well and looks great overall. Mongoose definitely puts out an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: Good Bicycle
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for my 9-year old granddaughter. She loves it and it fits her perfectly. The kickstand is solid and the overall quality of the bike is good. It is a touch heavy if she has to pick it up but the biggest negative is that it can be hard to change the gears especially downshifting. I can do it just fine but she lacks sufficient grip strength to do it most of the time. The derailleurs could be better. Overall, however, it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Media Worker

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Not sure I understand the reviews that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Not sure I understand the reviews that say it was difficult to assemble? Took 15 min with a pair of pliers, a screwdriver and a crescent wrench. Not a top quality bike by any measure but perfect for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Dtooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, well built.. a bit complex for a bike though.  Seems to be too much going on for a child.
customer_reviews.text: We like the bike, assembled fine and only had one problem where the chain was caught in the petal mechanism bending the links. Customer service was very helpful and replaced the chain with no issue. The bike is a bit much though, and the design is such that the frame is low enough that the seat has a long extension. Love the kick stand on this bike. The gears work, but with all the shocks, cables, and mechanisms to make this work is way to complex for a bike that a kid will use. I suspect long term, this can be a harder to maintain and more susceptible to trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ken

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bike was very easy to assemble and looks great. My daughter loves the color but one thing I didn’t think about was the weight of the bike before buying. The past 3 rides I went on with my daughter I noticed that she was getting tired quicker and moving slower than when she used her brothers bike. The other day I lifted her bike and noticed it was really heavy compared to his bike and even my bike. So as nice as the bike looks I regret not thinking about the weight of the bike as this bike is very heavy compared to other bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Pino Lage

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for Price; Splash Guards Needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked this bike right away, from the pic on the box. Once out of the box, 20 minute assembly, she was off and riding, loving it. CON: Two words... SPLASH GUARDS... the bike needs them, no ifs, ands or buts about it. First ride my daughter took, ground was kind of wet from prior rain, muddy wet track right up the back of her new shirt. Product placement... Shout, it works.
customer_reviews.author: CS Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Low quality bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike was not put together correctly or well at all. I had to spend an afternoon fixing/tuning this bike for my daughter to be able to ride it. Well worth the money to get a better bike. Only reason I didn't return it was I waited like a month to get it during COVID 19 lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but decent for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: First rest ride by 60# 10 yr old girl resulted in the cheap flimsy rear derailleur frame bent out of alignment, popped the chain and sent the poor kid down with a scraped knee and bruised elbow. Returned for a new bike, so far so good except the front brakes run the rim regardless of adjustment. Obviously cheap mass produced product with poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Skuratchski

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this without knowing anything about bikes (just that I wasn’t willing to spend $500 for a bike my daughter will only fit for a year). I am so impressed with the bike. My daughter loves the color, I lived the price and I feel like we will be able to save this one when my daughter outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: RobinFromCle

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent big girl's bike for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent big girl's bike for my daughter, who had outgrown the princess-themed single speed from her elementary school years. Assembly was manageable with an Allen wrench, Phillips-head (cross-tipped) screwdriver, and adjustable wrench (not provided).
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike, arrived quickly and was super easy to assemble. Quality is great! Looks fantastic. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH P WESTON

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, bad directions
customer_reviews.text: The directions are awful. They're generic Mongoose brand directions so they give you multiple options for installation. How am I supposed to know what set of handlebars they gave me? What type of breaks? What set of wheels? It's like a bad choose your own adventure book. I went to YouTube and found a helpful video. The bike is beautiful though and my daughter is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: this bike has worked out so great for my 13 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: After over a year and a half, this bike has worked out so great for my 13 year old daughter. She loves the index shifting and can really go anywhere she wants.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good bike, Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bike and our daughter will enjoy it. With that said - was pretty disappointed that the frame that comes already assembled showed up assembled incorrectly. The whole front end was on backwards which added a great deal of time to take apart and reassemble. So great back, but not great quality control happening.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Needed bike shop fixing after assembly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was really excited about this bike. Unfortunately after only riding it a couple times we needed to bring it to a bike shop as the breaks needed to be fixed, the derailer was bent and a handful of other things required fixing/tuning from the “pre-assembled bike. $100 later, I’m not sure the money I saved buying this online vs from a reputable bike shop was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Dry Rotted Tires
customer_reviews.text: The bike is beautiful and rides great. But be warned the tires are dry rotted less than two months after purchase. I have to buy two new tires now. So include two new tires in your purchase price when buying this bike. Sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far
customer_reviews.text: Most awaited one for my daughter. She is 9 and the lowest seat setting is fine for her. And she really enjoy riding this one. Good control, brake and multiple gear-change options. Once had a trouble when the chain slipped off the front chainrings, however I could able to put it back quickly without any tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If this bike is a gift unbox it and set it up before giving it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm having to take the bike to have the gears repaired due to a bent sprocket. The front wheel as well as the handlebars can not be turned due to over tightening. Just hoping the bearings are not damaged. Right now all I can say is its pretty. The damage to the bike was done during manufacturing NOT shipping. If my granddaughter hadn't fallen in love with it I would of sent it back,but now I'm going to have to pay for its repair.
customer_reviews.author: Neal- Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old likes this bike a lot. Overall this bike’s ride is smooth and quite. Changing gears is very easy and less noisy. Mostly kids will take some time to get used to the front derailleur changing.
customer_reviews.author: Sriram

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for my 11 year old daughter. Pretty sturdy when riding. It took us 30 minutes to set it all up. The person did a good job when designing it!😃 Good to ride in ages between 9-12. Instructions are included, but difficult to put it all together since it came in parts. Great bike 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: QIUYAN JIANG

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and double check the assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The bike has a nice looks, it is more purple than silver in person though. Upon putting it together we discovered that the handle bars can in the bike the wrong direction AND the front break was put on the back side of the tire instead of the front side. That all had to be fixed. Makes me worry about the entire physical safety of the bike
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Groseclose

customer_reviews.title: Bought used! Should've paid the extra for new one!
customer_reviews.text: The bike came in repackaged as described. I purchased it used assuming it would still be in good shape at a fraction of the cost of a new one, and all bikes everywhere are practically sold out. I haven't been able to go for a ride yet. The shaft that the seat mounts onto somehow is stuck/wedged into where it goes into on the actual bike. And the sprocket where the chain sits is bent and warped. Will have to try and contact mongoose or bring to a local bike shop to have it looked it.
customer_reviews.author: Janixa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: More than disappointed! Missing parts!!
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged and taped shut at one end. The bike is missing the pedals. We emailed the manufacturer 72 hours ago requesting pedals be sent and have not received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jay

customer_reviews.title: Mongoose Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike comes semiassembled, only the front part of the bike is assemble at home. The back part of the bike fell apart and my daughter fell off the bike. VERY Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike, but description said only the box was damaged, but the bike has scrapes all over. Some pieces are bent, but hopefully will still work. Would appreciate a partial refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Deformed chain
customer_reviews.text: The chain is deformed when I received the bike, not sure its a manufacturing issue or due to shipping, but I have to return it because the twisted chain would get off immediately when I try to ride it. There are some other small deforms on other parts of the bike as well. Also, the screws on the handle part are so tight and it's almost impossible to adjust it by yourself if you are a female.
customer_reviews.author: zhuyun chen

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good quality bike for the price. Bought for my 13yo daughter. Mongoose makes good, quality bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for a tween!
customer_reviews.text: We looked for a bike for our 12-year old and this is the perfect one! Bought it on sale for under $200! Great brand and so easy to put together. It took less than15 min. Our daughter loves it! Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: The bike shipped with Rear axle is  warped
customer_reviews.text: The bike shipped with Rear axle is warped. If I return this bike, my assembling charge will be gone. If I keep this, I have to trouble myself about contacting the maker to get the right part and pay for the replacement of the rear axle. Either way, Amazon.com wins and I the customer got screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Ding

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is perfect. I gave it for stars because the seat is horrible, lol. My butt is always in pain after riding. Going to have to purchase a replacement seat for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Bike was missing the left front axle nut. Not thrilled to discover that on December 23rd. I managed to find one that worked locally so I was still able to put the bike under the tree. Kid likes the bike so far.
customer_reviews.author: Butch77

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. So easy to put together. Just watch the front brake wires as they are connected to the brake mechanism. Front and back needed adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D'Anna

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes the bike it's a little smaller so shes able to manuver it better.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it so she can’t wait on spring break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put together but works
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not clear at all. You have to figure out a lot of things. The tools provided are not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Han Hai

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, easy to assemble but just a bit pricey! My daughter loved it! Quick shipping also, received it prior to the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: haranda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike! Heavy too!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The bike was easy to assemble and looks gorgeous! Time will tell regarding the quality of the manufacturing but fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: KurtL

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together, go through and tighten everything twice......the preinstalled parts, ie brakes, gears, were loose on the bike and the spokes needed to be tightened on the front wheel
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: I asked my dad for a mountain bike, and so we went to Walmart during quarantine, and we only saw 2 bikes in stock, so we looked in there app if there were some nice ones in stock. But they were all out of stock, we looked so hard for 24 inch bikes, but we could not find any until we saw this one. I love it so much, its so comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Just as described...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES her new bike! Easy to assemble and packaged well. It arrived a day earlier than expected, so glad I was home to receive the item.
customer_reviews.author: J n Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: The bike looks awesome and is great quality. The seat is hard as heck but my 12 year old granddaughter doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda DQ

customer_reviews.title: Great 10 year old bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bike and easily figured out the gears. It was also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: robert w woodring

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike and didn’t take long to out together
customer_reviews.author: jenna  kemp

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to shift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and the trip shifter is too tight for her to shift (it's hard for me to shift and I am a grown man). It has caused major trouble trying to teach her how to use her first 21 speed
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much to have issue right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Damaged packaging.... Front brakes were bent out of place. Rear gear was also bent and rubbing against the spokes. This was a dumpster fire from the box to the bike. Easy to assemble though.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah.C

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this bike. I was concerned that ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike. I was concerned that it might be too big or heavy for her (she is 11), but she says it is lightr than her previous bike and just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and packaged perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: If it takes you more than 10 minutes to set up this bike then ensure you are using the correct end of the wrench. It is a durable bike and zero issues with any aspect of my purchase. Kids are happy and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike. It's very durable and gear shifting is very smooth. The bike is also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. Not too hard to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Not too hard to assemble. I think I put the handlebar bracket in backwards and had to redo, but that was it. 😂
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Noppenberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; packaged well - great bike so far...
customer_reviews.author: mobius nebula

customer_reviews.title: Article arrived on delay ... so BAD
customer_reviews.text: When I boght the bike, the arrival date was set on 5 - 7 August, but it finally arrived on August 12. This bike was a present for my daughter's birthday, but she had to wait 5 days al least. This was a very bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: HELMUTH LARA

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money and very easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the money and very easy to put together. This was a gift for my daughter in Idaho. She put it together without any help from her husband.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Strong sturdy and worth the money, surprisingly it came sooner than expected. That was a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Via Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. My daughter loves it! The rear derailleur is a bit noisy and is going to need some adjustments. Also the water bottle holder placement is not very cohesive with the rear suspension. Hence the four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nancy
customer_reviews.text: The handle bar is tilted, cannot ride in a straight line. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: EasyT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bike. Simple to assemble and is a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bike. The welds are very strong. The shocks on the wheels are really nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Reinsch

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took this to a biking summer camp and it was great for all of the different rides they took.
customer_reviews.author: jamie wilson

customer_reviews.title: bad brake line
customer_reviews.text: brake line was bad when she rode the bike for the first time it frayed inside the housing.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 10 year old daughter well. Seems like decent quality for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Gelsleichter

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this bike again
customer_reviews.text: I had this bike one day and the chain broke I had to order another chain
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had much chance to ride yet. Hard to maneuver up and down 3 flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: It was very e easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She is 10 years old. It was very e easy to assemble. 20 minutes. Most things are pre assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Shaji John

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The gears completely broke and fell apart the first time my daughter got on to ride it. This was a pre assembled part on the bike. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: hydrogirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a child of 11 to teenage years if they ate petite.
customer_reviews.text: We were completely satisfied with this product. We bought it for our granddaughters birthday and she absolutely loves it. Very nice bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike my daughter liked it. The only issue is the fron rim it’s  a little bended.
customer_reviews.text: Today I assemble my bike everything is in good condition accept the front rim it’s a little bended.
customer_reviews.author: Jose diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but bent forks and derailier
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with front forks bent and derailier twisted and bent into spokes. Bike looks nice, so I’d like to get replacement parts. Please help me with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Front wheel is a little wobbly. Seat had some marks on it. The rest works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dod

customer_reviews.title: How can l get my Ups money back?
customer_reviews.text: When l open the box , it was damaged. After l went immediately to Ups and they charged me 16.05 for the box because it was really really damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Locarno

customer_reviews.title: Good bike!  Grip shifters, though...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bike. Perfect for my 7 year daughter. (she's 50 inches tall). These are "grip" gears which are a bit of challenge to change for younger kids. Still, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barak

customer_reviews.title: Bad bike
customer_reviews.text: Makes noise when braking. Does not run well and gets stuck when changing shifts. Easily stops whenever there is a bump
customer_reviews.author: Yenny antunez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The bike is nice but it makes a bad noise whrn moving it and it also is a little wobbly when riding it
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Not a problem with the bike. It is a valurle for money bike
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Spanos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike. My 9 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike. My 9 year old daughter loves it. The only reason I deducted a star is because it is a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: M.Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my 10 yr old as a Christmas gift. It was as easy as can be to put together. Adjusted the handle bars a little for her comfort, watched a YouTube video on how to shift properly and she was good to go. The only thing is you have to turn the wheel to the right so it doesn't fall or maybe change the kickstand. (the reason for 4 stars)
customer_reviews.author: Sharper76

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it except for the seat but that's a personal thing. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mroz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Received a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a previously opened beat up box. Parts were missing and bent!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Prospero

customer_reviews.title: A new bike with a faulty tyre
customer_reviews.text: A brand new bike couldn't last for one year, but one Tyre gives me problems.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gyan

customer_reviews.title: Derailleur snapped within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bike was defective and a critical piece broke within 2 weeks of light use by a 10 year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality Control issues from the factory.
customer_reviews.text: The QC on this bike is terrible. The first bike that I had received was missing bolts to align the front derailleur, and within 10 miles the rear hub was broken into pieces. I returned that bike, hassle free thanks to Amazon and ordered a replacement. The replacement seems "better" however, the threads to the left pedal were not straight. Every piece of the bike needs to be setup as well, but that was expected. If you do not know how to setup a bike, stay away from this, and go to the bike store. I still can not recommend bike because of the QC issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn't like it in the beginning. Once she got used to it she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and easy to assemble. My daughter loves her new bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tyshawana Mc Neil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: Very good bike , I love it , good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: leticia leon

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old daughter absolutely loves this bike. Purchased two months ago and not a single negative thing to report. Great value, free shipping (Prime), VERY easy to assemble....comes practically assembled already. I did add purple LED light bars (separate purchase) to be seen better if riding home at dusk from neighbors house. The bike is very solid and gives her a steady ride on and off road. She adapted to the shifts quickly as well. Not much else to say except we all love this purchase and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Also it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bike for the price. My daughter loves it. Also it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Babs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10yr old
customer_reviews.text: The bike is perfect for my 10yr old!! She has plenty of room to grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: All the ends on the brake and shifting cables fell off and are very sharp
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst experience ever. Brake is broke, lights are broke, bike is scratched. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike, seven year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike for my seven year old. Arrived in a double box to protect it. Ordered another bike for my nine year old from toysrus, arrived in one box with damaged gears and no seat in the box!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal....
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! Full suspension. Very adjustable. My daughter is very happy with this bike, even though it is slightly larger than she is used to...she can ride just fine and has 21 speeds.
customer_reviews.author: James Boulanger

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike so far. If you are not able to tune your own bike it or don't want to deal with it, it may be better to purchase from a bike shop where they will often do free tune ups for as long as you own your bike. A similar bike to this is about $300 at a bike shop (though the bike may be slightly better quality). I purchased this bike for my daughter because I didn't want to spend extra money on a bike she would outgrow in a few years. We were able to do the adjustments ourselves and so far the bike is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Martina

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but has a very heavy frame
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike but has a very heavy frame. I would have given it a higher rating but the rear derailleur is composite and broke with in15 min
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kort

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a purple bike for Christmas, and I could not find one locally. So I ordered this one as a gift and when it showed up it had a plane box around the normal manufactures packing, the bike was in great shape and there was little assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

product_meta.title: Mongoose Maxim Girls Mountain Bike, 24-Inch Wheels
product_meta.description: The 24-Inch Mongoose Maxim alluminum full suspension bike offers a smooth and controlled ride with a suspensin frame and front suspension fork. This bike can be riden easily on a wide variety of terrain and the Shimano gearing and SRAM twist shifters make this a breeze to shift. Alloy linear pull brakes for sure stopping power.
feature_bullets: Aluminum suspension frame maximizes comfort & performance
Suspension fork smoothes the bumps and increases control
21 speed Shimano rear derailleur with SRAM twist shifters changes gears easily
3 piece mountain crank offers wide gear ranges.Adjustable Seat Height
Alloy linear pull brakes for quick stopping
